Dialogue:
CC: Nice to meet you!
AY: Nice to meet you!
CC: Did you participate in any summer-like events?
AY: The only thing that felt like summer was eating ice cream! How about you?
CC: I went to the local festival that was revived for the first time in three years.
AY: How was it?
CC: The fireworks were beautiful.
AY: There were fireworks!
CC: I thought all the festivals had resumed, but it seems some still can't take place yet.
AY: I see. It might not be the case for us yet.
CC: I understand.
AY: Did you do things like goldfish scooping?
CC: I didn't do it, lol.
AY: Did you eat anything at the festival?
CC: Yes, we watched fireworks while eating fried chicken.
AY: That sounds like a perfect summer experience!
CC: I also enjoyed drinking beer.
AY: Beer, huh! Can you drink quite a lot?
CC: I'm about average. How about you?
AY: I'm not good with beer.
CC: Oh, I see. Do you generally not handle alcohol well?
AY: I prefer sweet drinks.
CC: So you like cocktails!
AY: Yes, like Horoyoi.
CC: Do you drink alone sometimes?
AY: Mostly with friends and family.
CC: I also drink only when I'm with others.
AY: It sounds enjoyable.
CC: It really is!
AY: Please share more experiences next time.

CC: Nice to meet you!
AY: Nice to meet you too!
CC: What do you usually do when you have time?
AY: I usually watch TV or play games.
CC: Are you more of an indoor person?
AY: Yes, I'm definitely an indoor person.
CC: I'm the same way!
AY: It's too hot outside!
CC: What kind of TV programs do you watch?
AY: Recently, I've been watching a lot of dramas.
CC: My favorite is the magical renovation.
AY: That sounds interesting! I'm watching it too.
CC: I didn't expect much, but it turned out to be surprisingly good.
AY: Yes, it's very enjoyable.
CC: The characters are quite charming, aren't they?
AY: Yes, they really add a lot to the show.
CC: What other dramas are you watching?
AY: This season, I'm watching Old Rookie.
CC: Oh, I'm watching that too.
AY: It's quite educational!
CC: That's true! It's teaching me a lot about sports.
AY: The main character is also quite charming.
CC: Ayano Go is really versatile in his roles.
AY: Yes, he even plays the wimpy character well!
CC: And the wife character is very admirable.
AY: She is indeed very impressive.
CC: Is there really someone as kind as that?
AY: And it seems beneficial financially too.
CC: I wish I could marry someone like Kanako-chan.
AY: If I were a man, I'd feel the same way!
